VelmaStartups.properties.notesText:
2018-11-09 BLB Changed soil properties to only reflect top layer. Checked parameters and made sure they comply with "extensive" green roofs. Changed directories.
2018-03-19 BLB Added cover and soil params for green roofs.
2018-02-21 BLB Running for 28 years + 1-year spinup to look at inter-annual variability in discharge reductions.
2018-02-15 BLB 50% green roofs. Changed Cover Map. Added Cover Species UniqueID 20 with identical characteristics to grass. Changed pervious layer to longfellow_10m_perm_25.asc
2018-02-14 BLB 25% green roofs. Changed Cover Map. Added Cover Species UniqueID 20 with identical characteristics to grass. Changed pervious layer to longfellow_10m_perm_25.asc
2018-02-12 Added fertilizer and mowing disturbances Fertilizer: half humus / half soluble. 2/3nh4 1/3no3 Mowing: take 30% of biomass, 20% of that taken offsite.
2018-02-05 Put in Irrigation disturbance so that people water their lawns. Threshold is 3.63 mm/day for each grass cell.
2018-02-01 put in values from 0d62 moea run. /calibration/VelmaCalibration.properties/be /cover/Cover1_Conifer/petParam1 /cover/Cover3_Grass/petParam1 /soil/Soil3_sandy_loam/ksLateralExponentialDecayFactor /soil/Soil3_sandy_loam/ksVerticalExponentialDecayFactor /soil/Soil3_sandy_loam/surfaceKs
objectives -0.615062362 variables 6.939899497 0.991064989 0.959912051 9.23E-05 0.002305796 771.1977744
2018-01-22 Separated Building (2) and Roads (13) into two separate cover types. Changed cover type file to lulc_complex_longfellow_10m_new.asc
2017-08-30 Set 1year spinup, matched outlet to observed data, and created simplified LULC. Grass is uniqueid 14 Buildings/Road is uniqueid 13 Conifer is uniqueid 3
Permable surfaces included. pervious_lulc_longfellow_1m.asc
2017-05-24 Set directories to L:\Priv\CORFiles\Projects\Velma\0_VELMA Projects\Case Studies\Seattle\Longfellow\longfellow_10m_velma
2016-12-08: Started with HJAndrews base xml. Historical Run AGE = all 0's COVER = all 3's Conifer SOIL = all 3's NEED TO CHECK PARAMETERS
